title: Grand Canyon’s explosive gastroenteritis was a 3-month, multisource outbreak
description: The outbreak mirrored a nationwide surge in norovirus outbreaks.

title: Razer joins the “handheld streaming console” wars, which are now a thing somehow
description: Android-based Razer Edge 5G is based on last year's Qualcomm reference design.

title: Today’s best deals: Apple MacBook Air, Sony and LG 4K TVs, Nintendo Switch, and more
description: Dealmaster also has PC components, charging gear, and gift card deals.

title: Cloudflare’s CAPTCHA replacement lacks crosswalks, checkboxes, Google
description: Cloud giant says its verification tool doesn't challenge or profile users.

title: More EV charging stations coming nationwide, electrifying 75K miles of highways
description: Access to 500,000 chargers could lay the groundwork to convert Americans to EVs.

title: Amazon’s Astro robot still isn’t ready for prime time
description: A year after its announcement, it's unclear when Astro will be ready.

title: Ubisoft’s biggest 2022 game delayed for sixth time in five years
description: Other delays out of 2022 leave Ubisoft with an unusually quiet holiday season.

title: DALL-E image generator is now open to everyone
description: DALL-E launched frenzy of image synthesis development but was invitation-only until now.

title: Google Maps gets augmented reality search results
description: Search for an ATM or restaurant and Maps can point the way via your camera feed.

title: Google Fiber touts 20Gbps download speed in test, promises eventual 100Gbps
description: Google Fiber test delivered 20.2Gbps downloads to exec's home in Kansas City.

title: Amazon’s $340 Kindle Scribe is its first e-reader with handwriting and pen support
description: It will also be Amazon's largest Kindle e-reader, with a 10.2-inch display.

title: Ship that warned Titanic of icebergs has been found at bottom of Irish Sea
description: The SS Mesaba was torpedoed by a German sub six years after Titanic's sinking.

title: Eero can now extend your mesh network with Echo devices
description: Also adding hotspot fallback during outages, plus company's first PoE products.

title: No, minors can’t just “opt out” of Destiny 2’s anti-cheating provisions
description: "Disaffirmation" defense may open cheating defendant to serious copyright claims.

title: Early renders show the Galaxy S23 ditching the camera bump
description: Base model design changes bring the phone more in line with the Ultra model.

title: Serious vulnerabilities in Matrix’s end-to-end encryption are being patched
description: Previously overlooked flaws allow malicious homeservers to decrypt and spoof messages.

title: Twitter says Elon Musk’s own data scientists did not back up bots claims
description: Social media group seeks sanctions as billionaire attempts to pull out of acquisition.

title: As a meteorologist, Hurricane Ian is the nightmare storm I worry about most
description: This is the kind of storm that destroys a community forever.

title: Western forests, snowpack, and wildfires appear trapped in vicious climate cycle
description: Extreme 2020 wildfires affected the water cycle in key mountain forests.

title: We interviewed Linux OS through an AI bot to discover its secrets
description: In the world's first operating system interview, Linux tells all about Windows, Torvalds, and its favorite distro.

title: Logitech finally makes a wireless mechanical keyboard with a true Mac layout
description: A nice gesture toward Mac users, but a full layout, switch options would be even better.
